Provo.Provo Peak: Provo Peak is a mountain peak in the Uinta National Forest in the Wasatch Range that is located within the city limits Provo, Utah, United States. The peak has an elevation of 11,068 feet (3,374 m), but a prominence of only 3,442 feet (1,049 m). Although located along the Wasatch Front, it is situated behind (east-southeast) of Y Mountain.
